text: (born January 3, 1979 in Rome) is an Italian celebrity chef. He is also an actor and television personality. Bellissimo is living and working in Japan, and nicknamed . Bellissimo writes for various Japanese cooking magazines. He has also written several books. == Television == * Handsome Kitchen (Fuji Television) * Waratte Iitomo! (Fuji Television) * GakkoChakkoTV (Akita Television) * Konnichiwa Itto6ken (NHK) * Kitchen ga hashiru! (NHK) * One Seg Lunch Box Raku Gohan (NHK) * Junbanmachi no Ryorikyoshitsu (LaLa TV) * Osama no brunch (Tokyo Broadcasting System) * Uchigohan (TV Asahi) * Eko no Saho (TV Asahi) * Shikamo!! (Nippon Television) * Sekai banzuke (Nippon Television) * Sekai fushigi hakken! (Tokyo Broadcasting System) * Sekai no minna ni kiitemita (Tokyo Broadcasting System) ==Movies== ===TV Series=== * Kyō wa Kaisha Yasumimasu. (2014).... Italian Chef * Kore wa Keihi de Ochimasen! (2019).... Italian Chef ===Dramas=== * Le avventure del Comandante Cappellini - Sensuikan Cappellini-go no Boken (2022).... Simone ==Books== * (2010) Ouchi de Itaria Gohan Berisshimo to oryōri dēto, Bunkasha 978-4821142941 * (2010) Sono Manma Obun Ryori, Shufunotomosha 978-4072691335 * (2012) Italian no Kihon to Oisha no Kotsu, Nittōshoinhonsha 978-4528015050 * (2013) Yidali shuai ge zhu chu dao ni jia : gan lan you jian kang liao li, 5 fen zhong YAMI shang cai, Taibei Shi : Tai shi wen hua shi ye gu fen you xian gong si 978-9863430032 * (2014) Bijinesu pason no sasou gijutsu : Tecniche di comunicazione e relazione interpersonale per uomini d'affari, Diamond-sha 978-4478026311 * (2014) Berisshimo na Omotemeshi Itariashiki koi no shokujiho : Tecniche di cucina italiana per avere successo in amore, Shufutoseikatsusha 978-4391146066 ==References== ==Other websites== * Official site (Japanese) * Cucina Bellissimo Cooking Team (Japanese) * Allestero.net Francesco Bellissimo Interview (Italian) * Vantan Future Creation FJapon Francesco Bellissimo Interview (Japanese) * Francesco Bellissimo on Japan Talent Database (Japanese) * Francesco Bellissimo Profile on Shimashow (English) Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Italian chefs Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian television personalities Category:Japanese television personalities Category:People from Rome Category:21st-century Italian writers
